results.title: Dental Resin for Periodontal and Tooth Root Regeneration via Metformin to Enhance Osteogenic and Cementogenic Differentiation of Human Periodontal Ligament Stem Cells.
results.text_hl: OBJECTIVES: This study developed a novel dental resin incorporating @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ to repair @<m>DISEASE_Root_Caries</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017213 @@@root caries@@@ and @DISEASE_Periodontitis @DISEASE_MESH:D010518 @@@periodontitis@@@ defects.
